snippet.textDisplay: Did anyone else become *really* excited when a tough boss started slumping over?
snippet.textOriginal: Did anyone else become *really* excited when a tough boss started slumping over?

snippet.textDisplay: @Moses Isaiah B. Palces Seeing any of the dragons *finally* display a sign of injury was a real treat; at that moment, you gained a second wind before doubling your efforts to bring the fight to an end.
snippet.textOriginal: @Moses Isaiah B. Palces Seeing any of the dragons *finally* display a sign of injury was a real treat; at that moment, you gained a second wind before doubling your efforts to bring the fight to an end.

snippet.textDisplay: Ragitsu oh yeah. After what those dragons made you do, it was more than satisfying to beat em all to a pulp.
snippet.textOriginal: Ragitsu oh yeah. After what those dragons made you do, it was more than satisfying to beat em all to a pulp.

snippet.textDisplay: Definitely felt pumped up when Marcy started to slump. I hated her IceBlast!
